host.description: Host Endpoint of the Redshift Cluster (must include the cluster-id, region and end with .redshift.amazonaws.com)
host.title: Host

username.description: Username to use to access the database.
username.title: Username

s3_bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name
s3_bucket_name.description: The name of the staging S3 bucket to use if utilising a COPY strategy. COPY is recommended for production workloads for better speed and scalability. See AWS docs for more details.

s3_bucket_path.title: S3 Bucket Path
s3_bucket_path.description: The directory under the S3 bucket where data will be written. If not provided, then defaults to the root directory.

s3_bucket_region.title: S3 Bucket Region
s3_bucket_region.description: The region of the S3 staging bucket to use if utilising a copy strategy.

access_key_id.description: The Access Key Id granting allow one to access the above S3 staging bucket. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the given bucket.
access_key_id.title: S3 Key Id

secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the above access key id.
secret_access_key.title: S3 Access Key

iam_role_arn.description: The IAM role ARN used to copy files from S3 to Redshift
iam_role_arn.title: IAM Role Name

max_connections.description: Maximum number of connections in the connection pool
max_connections.title: Maximum Connections
